name: Seer Battle Slash Trail
description:
Hack and slash your way past ghosts on the way to the dragon at the end.
It is a quick platformer hack and slasher. 

The tileset art is by Ansimuz

The main character art is by Pimen

You can get the source code for this game here.

You can learn from and reuse the source code,
but not the specific sprite sheet used in this 'trial' game.
